attributes.title: Geoff Leesley
attributes.twitter: https://twitter.com/geoffleesley'''Geoff Leesley''' (born June 1, 1949) is an English actor. He has appeared in television series such as ''The Bill'', ''Coronation Street'', ''Little Britain'', ''Midsomer Murders'', ''Casualty'', ''Eastenders'', ''Law & Order: UK'', ''White Heat'', ''Doctors'' and ''Holby City'' as well as the film ''Wimbledon''.In ''Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series'', he voices Lord Ludd Whitehill and Norren.==Credits==Telltale Game Series Credits
